r.d:
The uopz extension is focused on providing utilities to aid with unit testing PHP code.
It supports the following activities:
* Intercepting function execution * Intercepting object creation * Hooking into function execution * Manipulation of function statics * Manipulation of function flags * Redefinition of constants * Deletion of constants * Runtime creation of functions and methods
r.n: - Add "uopz.exit" configuration option, to allow the execution of exit opcodes or not (default=0 to keep current behavior) - Improve opcache optimizer compatibility - Display ini settings in module info
